main event: A ground visual observation of a stationary UFO at Langley AFB, Virginia on October 8, 1960.
interesting points: The object exhibited variable lighting, possibly pulsating.,It was reported to have no tail or exhaust and was described as throwing sparks.,The duration of the observation was about 3 seconds.,The object disappeared instantly, similar to entering a bank of clouds.,A similar object was later reported by GCI radar.
sighted object: pencil-shaped object with dull red and yellow colors
witness description: Donald R. Clark, a weather observer at Langley AFB
